about_the_game:
Dive into the world of Mad Experiments with 3 new masks to wear during your adventures, as well as the original files of the soundtracks!

3 exclusive masks are included:
  • Medusa gas mask
  • Robotic Steampunk mask
  • Steampunk human mask

And the original HD files of all the soundtracks of Mad Experiments 2: Escape Room are included:
  • Room 1: Library
  • Room 2: Greenhouse
  • Room 3: Train
  • Main Theme
  • Bonus track: Mad Experiments 1 - One Day (full version)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04 or more recent
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Vulkan drivers for the best experience. Also compatible with Mesa drivers.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04 or more recent
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Vulkan drivers for the best experience. Also compatible with Mesa drivers.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
